ISADORE APPELL v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 48948. Decided February 8, 1955] *673Mr. Monroe Oppenheimer for the plaintiff. Messrs. Sher, Oppenheimer <& Harris and James H. Heller were on the briefs. Mr. Francis X. Daly, with whom was Mr. Assistant Attorney General Warren E. Burger, for the defendant.
